abstrac: Looking For Telemarketing Projects for New Call Centre
bio:
As the manager, trainer and recruiter for an outbound third party tele-sales campaign for A leading Canadian financial institution, who also ranks among the world’s top online financial service firms.
In less than 2 12 weeks, our agents(30-130) were able to fast track through orientation and client-specific training, transition onto the production floor, and reach the client’s expected performance, quality targets.
In one year, the teams I trained and managed generated over $20 million in premiums and enrolled 11,000 clients per month into a new form of insurance coverage.
A relationship that began in 2005 with only one product offering has now grown into a multi-program partnership for my former employer. 

This was all started with myself at the helm for 3 years, doing all training, some hiring, all human resource issues for some time, and managing of staff that ranged starting from 30 all the way to 130 agents by the time I left the company. I understand all facets of ma

abstrac: Small Business Owner, Start-up Consultant, Project Manager, Financial Planner
bio: I recently opened a successful restaurant. I have spent years assisting small businesses in developing business plans and financial plans in a variety of fields ranging from product development and fulfillment to film studios and more.  I have worked with financial planning departments for multiple fortune 100 companies and have worked in New York City with two of the largest banks in the US.  My passion is for newer and smaller companies and my history and experience in the larger corporations has given me the tools to help establish stronger foundations and prepare better in all size and maturity companies.
Business Planning, Alternative Marketing, Start-ups, Budgets, Financial Modeling, Business Intelligence,Financial Analysis, Performance Management

abstrac: IT Professional for Shopping Carts and Remote Service & Support
bio:
My web site and e-commerce skills were gained while building my own company web sites. Starting with raw HTML using a text editor through learning and using modern CMS such as Drupal and WordPress. At this time I prefer working with CMS and recommend these to my clients.





I have over 22 years of experience installing, servicing and supporting Unix-like systems starting with SCO Xenix up through modern Linux and *BSD variants. I have experience installing, servicing and supporting IBM OS/2 and Serenity eComStation. I have experience installing, servicing and supporting various Microsoft desktop systems up through "Windows 7".




My SOHO company provides remote monitoring of systems over the internet for a flat monthly fee. As of now we offer three levels of monitoring.

Payment Method: I prefer SafePay Escrow with Check or Wire Transfer. I will only use SafePay Escrow with Check or Wire Transfer when dealing with a new client. My established clients with a payment history can arrange for other payment methods.



Communication: My preferred methods of communication are e-mail, instant messages, then phone. 


General Availability: I sometimes work odd hours and weekends, but generally my day is 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Monday through Friday CST/CDT.


Feedback / Endorsement: If you find my work of value to you, please leave positive feedback for me on guru.com.


Code of Ethics: I will not do any work with software that is acquired illegally. I do not work for people who propose to create a SPAM system, malicious software or website for same. I will do what I say I will do. If I believe some task is beyond my ability to accomplish well in a time-frame given I will state so up front.
